name: Raspberry Summer Berry Pops
description: Everything tastes better on a stick, especially your favourite berries! Tart and sweet make a perfect pair in these berry filled popsicles. Less fat and sugar than the storebought alternatives, these pops are worth the wait!

ingredients.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix or Strawberry Margarita Mix

preparation:
1. Stir pinches of Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix into raspberry juice.
  2. Place 4 raspberries per popsicle mold.
  3. Top with juice and freeze for 4 hours.
